services.name: Custom AI Agents
services.description: Intelligent assistants tailored to your business needs, including chatbots, virtual assistants, and task-specific AI agents

services.name: Machine Learning Models
services.description: Predictive analytics and data insights through custom ML models

services.name: Generative AI Solutions
services.description: Content creation and automation using large language models and generative AI

faqs.question: What types of AI models do you build?
faqs.answer: We build various types of AI models including classification models, regression models, recommendation systems, natural language processing models, computer vision models, and custom generative AI solutions.

faqs.question: How long does it take to develop a custom AI agent?
faqs.answer: Development time varies based on complexity. Simple chatbots can be built in 2-4 weeks, while complex AI agents with multiple integrations may take 6-12 weeks.

faqs.question: Do you provide training data or do we need to provide it?
faqs.answer: We can work with your existing data or help you collect and prepare training data. We also offer data augmentation and synthetic data generation services when needed.

faqs.question: Can you integrate AI models with our existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in seamless integration with existing business systems through APIs, webhooks, and custom connectors. We support integration with CRMs, databases, and enterprise software.

faqs.question: What programming languages and frameworks do you use?
faqs.answer: We primarily use Python with frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. For deployment, we use FastAPI, Docker, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure.
